QuestData.Title: Calamity Jade
QuestData.Description: You ever seen a shale spider, $c? Usually harmless, just creepin' around eatin' rocks, but they got a taste for jade like cubs on candy. The boys call 'em "nibblers."$B$BA few days back, we tunneled into a huge nest of these critters. They spilled out into the mines and went crazy, chewed up damn near everything in sight - including some of the boys.$B$BYou get in there and clear 'em out, and we got plenty of jade to spare. The quarry is directly west of here.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay 12 Greenstone Nibblers and 6 Greenstone Gorgers at the Greenstone Quarry.
QuestData.CompletionText: Never thought nibblers would be a big enough threat to choke up the whole mine.
QuestData.RewardText: Well I'll be... you actually did it!$B$BYou lookin' for a more permanent job, $gbuddy:sister;? I could use a bruiser like you around full-time!
